reviewText:
This B-Movie made for video (vhs) from Magnum Entertainment is worth finding and watching for the scenes with MICHELE BAUER alone! Its and indie T n' A comedy spoof/satire set in Los Angeles CA. Shot on video during the late 80's. The good thing about this film is that it doesn't take its self too seriously. In never departs from what it truly is. There are some great satirical moments when we are introduced to LA girls trying to make it in Hollywood. But for the most part it is simply about BOOBS! All kinds of Boobs!
Stars: Michele Bauer ( reform school girls  - night of the living babes)  with: Andrew Nichols John Baker - Blondi Terri Lynn Peake Gail Harris Roxanna Vanalden Venus DeLight Heidi PaineLois Ayres Iris Condon Krista Lan Rachel Ryan Dorothy Ann WarnerIrving the Dwarf - Dorothy Ann Warner Angst ArguleJohn Rand - Dir by Gregory Dark  A Sex Romp Through Hollywood as a maniac attempts to find the "perfect 10" on the streets of Los AngelesWacky Wild Exploitation Spoof - Must See Scenes with Michele Bauer Features Shower Scenes -  Stripping, Nude Twister and much more! Rated R Nudity Sexual Material  Bikini's and Big 80's Hair!
